alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:00PM EDT until August 03 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/ FOR WESTERN PULASKI AND CENTRAL STARKE COUNTIES... At 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Walkerton to near Francesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Knox, North Judson, Francesville, Hamlet, Medaryville, Toto, Clarks, Denham, Brems, Grovertown and Bass Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
